resources.string: Hughs Tour Guide App

For the perfect walking holiday in Ireland come join us in the heart of walking in Wicklow.\n\nThe picturesque village of Tinahely is just over an hour from Dublin. Blessed with some of Ireland’s most beautiful landscapes, hills and mountains, it is no wonder that it is also one of Ireland’s favourite walking destinations and as part of Discover Ireland’s Walkers Welcome programme, Tinahely is focused on making your walking holiday a pleasure.
Grade: Strenuous / Length: 28km / Time: 6 hours / Format: Loop / Ascent: 350m
